plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/panel.Attention une trop grande plage de date: Warning: a too wide date range can take very long time to be calculated, or even will never be displayed

plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Veuillez préciser les actions que le the: Please detail which actions the thermostat is allowed to perform for heating and cooling.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Précisez l'écart de température que le t: Please detail the temperature range the thermostat is allowed to drive.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pour chauffer je dois ?: To heat, what should be done?
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pour refroidir je dois ?: To cool, what should be done?
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pour tout arrêter je dois ?: To stop everything, what should be done?
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.A chaque changement de consigne je dois: For each change of set point, what should also be done?
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Les modes, permettent d'ajouter à votre: The modes allow you to add predefined setpoints to your thermostat. Example: a comfort mode which triggers an action on your thermostat with a set temperature of 20 ° C
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.La déclaration des ouvertures concernées: Definition of all openings that may impact your thermostat (door, window...) will allow the thermostat to control properly the temperature.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Alerte si l'ouverture dure plus de (min): Alert if the opening lasts more than (min)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cron de renvoi des commandes du thermost: Cron to send back thermostat commands (stop, heating, cooling), if your thermostat doesn't start or stop correctly, use this check.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Délai max entre 2 changements de tempéra: Max delay between 2 probe temperature changes (min)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Délai maximum entre 2 changement de temp: Maximum time between 2 temperature changes before the thermostat fails
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Durée des cycles de chauffe\/climatisati: Duration of heating / cooling cycles (cannot be less than 15 min)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.% minimum de cycle à faire (sinon la mis: Minimal % of cycle to perform (otherwise heating will be switched on during next cycle)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Limite les cycles marche\/arrêt incessan: Limits incessant on / off cycles (pellet, gas, fuel oil) and PID
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Seuil de cycle où le chauffage est consi: Cycle threshold where heating is considered hot (%)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Offset à appliquer si le radiateur est c: Offset to be applied if the radiator is considered hot (%)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Seuil de déclenchement de la défaillance: Threshold triggering heating failure (1 by default)
Threshold triggering cooling failure (1 by default)
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Autoriser le thermostat à démarrer avant: Allow the thermostat to start before the time so that the temperature reaches the set point at the desired time. Attention only works if the thermostat is managed via the agenda plugin
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Pour une meilleure régulation, il est co: For better control, it is advisable not to change these coefficients as they are computed and updated automatically.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/php\/therm.Cron de vérification des valeurs des son: Value temperature sensors check, if your thermostat doesn't start or stop correctly, use this ckeck.

plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/js\/thermo.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce mo: Do you really want to deleted this mode
You don't have any scheduling. Please click here to schedule your thermostat with Agenda plugin.
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/js\/thermo.Liste des programmations du plugin Agend: List of schedules plugin programming linked to the Thermostat
plugins\/thermostat\/desktop\/js\/thermo.Eteindre si ouvert plus de (min): Turn off if open more than (min)

: Please note the interior temperature is above the authorized threshold:
plugins\/thermostat\/core\/class\/thermo.La température de consigne minimum ne pe: The minimum set temperature cannot be higher than the maximum set
plugins\/thermostat\/core\/class\/thermo.Le temps de chauffe minimum doit etre co: The minimum heating time must be between 0% and 90%
plugins\/thermostat\/core\/class\/thermo.Le temps de cycle doit etre supérieur à: Cycle time must be more than 15min
